title: Garbage Disposals, Expansive 24-Hour Fitness Center

posting_body: Use this link for more information:
THE PARKER APARTMENTS IN EL MONTE, CA
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.
Experience a home that's perfect for you in every way at The Parker Apartments in El Monte, CA.
Your new home will have all the pleasures of comfort and convenience.
Our studio, one and two bedroom floor plans are spacious and will allow you to get creative with your home decor.
Each apartment has wonderful amenities like spacious closets, gas range stoves, hardwood-inspired flooring, air conditioner.
The community amenities we offer are just as great.
As a resident, you'll enjoy a 24-Hour fitness center, three barbeque areas, 24 Hour laundry facilities, assigned carport parking.
Our community is pet-friendly so your fur babies are welcomed too.
Be delighted when you relish everything The Parker Apartments has to offer.
Take a tour of our gorgeous El Monte apartments and see if we are a good fit for you.
Let us help you take the first step to find your dream home.
*Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice.
Minimum lease terms and occupancy guidelines may apply.
Deposits may fluctuate based on credit, rental history, income, and/or other qualifying standards.
AMC-CA, Inc, dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE # 01525033
From the 10 Freeway: Exit the 605 freeway on Santa Anita Ave and head North.
Turn left on Valley Blvd and turn right on Arden Way.
Our community is located on 4640 Arden Way, on the corner of Arden Way and Mullhall Street.
From the 605 Freeway: Exit Lower Azusa Road and head West passing Santa Anita Ave. Make a left turn on Arden Way.
Our community is located on the corner of Arden Way and Mullhall Street.
We are a pet friendly community and accept cats and dogs with a two pet limit.
We do have breed and weight restrictions.
Please contact property for additional information.
Must provide proof of income meets the minimum of 2.5 times the amount of rent.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
